summary: Corporate Trainer and Performance Coach with over 25 years of business experience, including 18 years in training. Highly energetic and engaging speaker, skilled at coaching for peak performance, change management, and improving job-related competencies. Experienced in designing, delivering, and evaluating instructor-led training and wellness programs; adept at mentoring and building trust with participants.

experience.title: Corporate Facilitator, Performance Coach and Developer
experience.description: Collaborate with senior leadership to tailor training. Design, development, implementation and administration of instructor-led corporate training including feedback survey forms and supporting materials. Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of training programs with the client. Maintain high performance standards through individual coaching.

experience.title: Health Coach and Corporate Health Educator
experience.description: Coached patients using motivational interviewing to guide behavior change. Delivered wellness initiatives for physical, social, occupational, intellectual and emotional wellbeing. Provided telephonic health coaching for 50-90 patients per week; supported cholesterol, blood pressure, weight management, exercise, glucose, stress management and smoking cessation. Recognized in top 5% of coaching staff; mentored 15 monthly peer health coaches.

experience.title: Certified Wellness Program Manager, Health Coach and Corporate Health Educator
experience.description: Developed results-oriented wellness programs for corporations and individuals. Created interventions for incentives, recognition campaigns and vendor selection. Implemented a corporate wellness division for a health brokerage firm. Authored and published 'Healthy Profits: The 5 Areas of Strategic Wellness in the Workplace' and contributed to other works. Presented to international, local and regional audiences concerning soft skills training and workplace wellness.

experience.title: Manager of Retail Systems, Project Manager and Trainer
experience.description: Managed workflow, quality control, and conflict resolution. Supervised third-party vendors on corporate projects. Trained True Value employees, trainers and members on corporate software projects. Project Manager for a $1 million ground up in-store catalog/ordering system reaching 1000+ users. Coordinated a 40 member team in multiple states for over a two year period. Oversaw departmental management with profits exceeding $6.5 million.

education.degree: Certified Professional Life Coach in Personal Life Coaching
Foundations of Motivational Interviewing I & II

certifications: Foundations of Motivational Interviewing I & II (Mid-Atlantic ATTC) - 2012
Intrinsic Coach Development - Intrinsic Solutions International - 2010
Certified Professional Life Coach in Personal Life Coaching - Life Coach College - 2004
